name: A Die Story
description:
Take down that evil covenant of non-cubits by plowing through an infinite arena. Use roll to survive dangerous situations, but be careful; it gives and takes. With a bit of luck, you'll be fine.

You're only as strong as your roll.

You have 3 health.
Don't go near the Red one.

Controls:

Movement:  WASD or  Arrow Keys
Roll: Space or Right Click
Attack: Left Click
